tooltip.lzm_elements.attribute.type.cryo: Deals more damage the higher the target's maximum health.
Increases damage up to +30% based on the target's max health (0–200 HP).
Effectiveness may vary with target’s current health.
tooltip.lzm_elements.attribute.type.elec: Damage scales with the target's armor. Stronger if the target is charged (Conductor).
Increases damage up to +33% based on armor (8–30 Armor); +20% extra if affected by 'Conductor'.
Reduces damage from 0% to -10% when the target has low armor (0–8 Armor).
tooltip.lzm_elements.attribute.type.geo: Deals more damage if the target is grounded, and even more if rooted. Weaker against airborne targets.
Increases damage by +20% if grounded; +20% more if affected by 'Rooted'.
Reduces damage by -10% if the target is airborne.
tooltip.lzm_elements.attribute.type.hydr: Deals bonus damage to targets with low max health, especially if airborne. Less effective against weakened foes.
Increases damage up to +25% based on target's max health (10–80 HP); +25% bonus if the target is airborne.
Damage bonus is reduced as the target's current health decreases.
tooltip.lzm_elements.attribute.type.phys: Base damage is reduced by the target's resistance.
tooltip.lzm_elements.attribute.type.pyro: Deals more damage to lightly armored enemies, and less to heavily armored ones.
Increases damage from +30% to 0% based on target's armor (0–20 Armor).
Reduces damage from 0% to -10% when the target has high armor (20–30 Armor).
